The game is pretty fun and really silly for about 2-3 matches, each time you play it.
After that it gets boring pretty fast. I don't get how some people can play this for hours getting up to many hundreds or even thousand of hours. No offense but if you are one of these people your brain is probably rather small and you're most likely an uncreative person. 
When my friend keeps forcing me to play this beyond 2 matches, I'm having trouble to not fall asleep on my keyboard.
I still recommend this game though!
Since I am definitely having  s o m e  fun with it. :D

THIS GAME IS NOT FRIENDLY TO NEW PLAYERS!

Basically here are the issues you'll encounter as a new player, as well as issues in general:

-The $178 AUD price tag (for base game+all survivors+killers)

-The perk system being EXTREMELY grindy

-A lot of game knowledge is required, usually when it comes to perks...that you have not even unlocked yet

-The community is extremely toxic, especially from the side of survivors, with teabagging, bigoted BM in the post-game chat, and in general a toxic outlook of the game

-It feels like both a casual and competitive game, with only a single queue type to cater to both. There is only ranked mode, otherwise you need to find 4 other friends to play custom games

-SWF or Survive With Friends is complete bs to face as you are going up against a team of 4, who are all usually in Discord, and their sole purpose is usually to genrush and BM the killer. This is especially rough for newer killer players, as they do not have any good tier 3 perks unlocked, and if they do they are not running the optimal setup.

-It takes a ridiculous amount of time to unlock survivors and killers for free, and an even longer amount of time to unlock skins for free. Oh, and the general monetization plan charges you ridiculous rates!

-The game is a buggy mess thanks to the engine, with more bugs coming out every patch than actual patch changes

-Game balance is completely off, with the game being extremely survivor-sided, while also giving killers extremely anti-fun perks, add-ons, and offerings (*cough* Moris *cough*). Survivors dictate the general flow of the game...while killers just feel incredibly overbearing if they so choose to run taboo setups to ruin your fun.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

But even after all that, the game is still really enjoyable when the stars do align. However, due to how grindy it is I cannot recommend this game to other people, let alone other friends. Players shouldn't have to be 4 year veterans to be able to unlock tier 3 perks, this process should take less than 6 months AT LEAST.

dead game

8.5/10

This game was recommended to me by a friend, and I bought it simply to play as Ghostface and kill people. I ended up barely ever playing as a killer, and mostly played as a survivor with my friends in public lobbies against random killers. It's very intense at first, and I sweated a lot and there were a good number of jump scares. I enjoyed the mechanics, and I didn't have as many lag problems as some others seemed to have (I do have fast internet, and also I have never been good enough at the game to really notice something being too "off" with the lag). But my friends and I always have fun with it, and it's surprisingly balanced for being such an asymmetrical game, at least, at the lower levels I played at. When you won, it feels like you barely won. And when you lost, it didn't feel like you had absolutely no chance. I definitely recommend playing it with your friends, as the chat sessions can get intense, and there can be a lot of shrieking and yelling and meme-ready screaming. Very fun overall, glad I bought it, and worth the price.

This game is what ended up starting my love of the horror genre as a whole. Both the licensed and original chapters are a ton of fun, and despite the rather frequent appearance of bugs (though I personally don't see them that often myself, fortunately) the game is very enjoyable. It's particularly fun to play with friends, so if you're looking for a fun online co-op game, or just love the horror genre (particularly movies and tv shows), I strongly recommend checking this game out (there's free weekends and sales at times, so if you're unsure, try it during one of those).

Плюсы: разнообразие маньяков, небольшая цена, возможность игры с друзьями, окружение делают игровой процесс воистину незабываемым. Частые обновления и добавления в игру новых вещей не дают заскучать.

Минусы: комьюнити. Весь поднимаемый шум по поводу неиграбельности Dead by Daylight происходит именно из-за части игроков. Они не умеют проигрывать, не желают понять других игроков, тем самым портя раунд и игру. Баланс тоже оставляет желать лучшего - к высшему рангу может попасть низший, и наоборот. Ну и вишенкой на торте- использование маньяка и его ПК как хост-сервер для раунда. Некоторые умные хосты намеренно понижают качество соединения в игре, чтобы упростить себе жизнь, что тоже не красит игру. Баги, незначительные и чаще всего возникающие по вине багоюзеров, не портящие игровой процесс, но всё же баги.

Общий итог: со стороны разработчика всё выполнено в лучшем виде, игра развивается и не забывается после первых 20-50 часов, проведённых в ней. Всё остальное возложено на игроков, на их отношение к миру игры. Игра определённо стоит своих денег, позволяет отрешиться от реального мира с его проблемами и погрузиться в Атмосферу. Именно с большой буквы, ведь ради Атмосферы и создана Dead by Daylight.
